text: Group F of the 2022 FIFA World Cup will be from 23 November to 1 December 2022. The teams in the groups are Belgium, Canada, Morocco and Croatia. The top two teams will go to the round of 16. ==Teams== Draw position Team Pot Confederation Method of qualification Date of qualification Finals appearance Last appearance Previous best performance FIFA Rankings FIFA Rankings Draw position Team Pot Confederation Method of qualification Date of qualification Finals appearance Last appearance Previous best performance March 2022 October 2022 F1 1 UEFA UEFA Group E winners 13 November 2021 14th 2018 Third place (2018) 2 F2 4 CONCACAF CONCACAF Third Round winners 27 March 2022 2nd 1986 Group stage (1986) 38 F3 3 CAF CAF Third Round winners 29 March 2022 6th 2018 Round of 16 (1986) 24 F4 2 UEFA UEFA Group H winners 14 November 2021 6th 2018 Runners-up (2018) 16 Notes ==Standings== In the round of 16: * The winners of Group F will play the runners-up of Group E. * The runners-up of Group F will play the winners of Group E. ==Matches== All times listed are local, AST (UTC+3). ===Morocco vs Croatia=== ===Belgium vs Canada=== ===Belgium vs Morocco=== ===Croatia vs Canada=== ===Croatia vs Belgium=== ===Canada vs Morocco=== ==Discipline== Fair play points will be used as tiebreakers if the teams are tied after the overall and head-to-head rules. These points are based on yellow and red cards given to a team. The points are: *first yellow card: minus 1 point; *indirect red card (second yellow card): minus 3 points; *direct red card: minus 4 points; *yellow card and direct red card: minus 5 points; Team Match 1 Match 1 Match 1 Match 1 Match 2 Match 2 Match 2 Match 2 Match 3 Match 3 Match 3 Match 3 Points Team Points 2 −2 1 1 −2 3 1 1 −5 2 2 4 −8 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2022 FIFA World Cup
title: 2022 FIFA World Cup Group F
